Description:
Position titleETL Developer /Senior Software EngineerYears of Experience5-8 yearsLocation - GurgaonDepartment - Business IntelligenceShift Timings - 2:00PM to 11:00PM ISTDepartment overviewJoin our Winning Team as a Data Integration SpecialistWhen was the last time you bragged about where you work? At CARFAX, we do it every day. Why? Because we’re proud to work for a company with a strong mission and trusted brand. We’re proud to work with people who care about what they do and work hard every day to deliver their best. We’ve created the type of company culture where the term, “work- hard play- hard” is taken to new heights. Even today, while working remotely, our culture is strong and our team is connected!Position summaryAs a Data Integration Specialist on the Business Intelligence (BI) team you will help provide trusted reporting, data, and analytics for CARFAX to demonstrate value across business channels, assess product performance to influence direction, support internal business operations, and external customer facing products. You’ll play a key role in BI DevSecOps team to ensure data processes meet expected quality standards and SLAs.What You'll DoCollaborate with product managers, BI Reporting Specialists, and other project stakeholders to understand data/ reporting requirements and goals.
Perform data analysis to check requirements feasibility. Share data findings with project stakeholders to make appropriate project decisions.
Collaborate with Architect and other BI team members to design optimal data pipelines. Translate business requirements into technical specification, including source to target mappings (STTM).
Follow STTMs and design guidelines to develop and test efficient ETL solutions using Informatica or external programming/ scripting languages, if necessary.
Identify and reuse ETL components and services to avoid duplicative implementations
Integrate ETL routines into production job streams
Monitor and support daily data load jobs to ensure timely completion.
Address all data load warnings or errors. Take appropriate actions to independently resolve data load issues. Proactively communicate external team dependencies to US based BI team and source data owners.What You Need to Get the Job DoneEducation level: Bachelors in Information technology, Computer Science or equivalent experience.
Year of Experience: 5 to 8years
Specific skills:Strong SQL and PL/SQL skills
Experience in developing complex ETL mappings, workflows, mapplets in Informatica Cloud (IICS/IDMC)
Experience using Informatica Power Centre Designer, Workflow Manager, Workflow Monitor, and Repository
Experience in unit testing and troubleshooting of ETL jobs
Significant experience optimizing ETL routines and environments
Experience working on Redshift and other AWS tools/ tech.    
Ability to work effectively in a rapidly changing, team-based environment
Excellent Communication and collaboration skills with business and technical teamsPreferred skills:Experience in Agile methodology
Experience with Data Lake highly preferred.
Experience scheduling jobs using Control-MPersonal characteristics
Carfax prefers collaboration over video conference. Candidate should be comfortable with the same.
Certifications etc
Informatica or other ETL tools
SQL certifications-----------------------------------------------------------Equal Opportunity EmployerS&P Global is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race/ethnicity, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, marital status, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other status protected by law.  Only electronic job submissions will be considered for employment.
